text: Is there a way to view the API request and response in the monitoring section of my app? Trying to check why we don't see a record created for a contact sent through HubSpot App.
in Monitoring > API calls, it only shows these info when there's an error on the call (HTTP 400) and not on 201 or 200
for more context, we keep getting a HTTP 201 response for leads sent through API with oAuth. We can't find any record for the lead in the connected HubSpot account
